author: sduff
title: Baywatch star Charlotte McKinney gives an accidental nipple flash as she exposes herself in dangerously low-cut swimsuit
text:
Flash for the cameras Baywatch star Charlotte McKinney gives an accidental nipple flash as she exposes herself in dangerously low-cut swimsuit 
The 23-year-old beauty was forced to adjust herself on a packed beach Pictured Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STUNNING model and actress Charlotte McKinney found herself flashing her breasts to a packed beach while soaking up the sun in a dangerously open swimming costume. 
The 23-year-old Florida born star was spotted sunning herself in Miami on Friday. Charlotte McKinney inadvertently freed the nipple in Miami on Friday Splash News 23 The model and actress was enjoying the Florida sun 
Charlotte’s daring choice of swimwear had a deep cup design with the thin black material tying behind her neck and just covering her modesty. 
But as the blonde beauty took to the ocean and strolled the sands she struggled to keep herself covered. Related articles 10 Things You Need to Know about The Brit Awards 2017 ON DEMAND The Natives: America's Forgotten, Billions, Ultimate Beastmaster and Patriot...all at your fingertips this week Ding dong! SPOILER ALERT Wedding bells for Emmerdale's Aaron and Robert...until the police turn up 'He was always joking around' Hollyoaks actress Linda Gray talks about working with Dallas star Larry Hagman 'It's frightening' Sam Riley and Kate Bosworth star in new BBC thriller which sees Nazis win the Battle of Britain FILM GUIDE Testament of Youth, Despicable Me and The Meddler are just some of the films on your TV this week 'THEY MELT MY HEART' Emmerdale fans' joy as Robert Sugden announces he wants to marry Aaron Dingle before he gets sent to prison Downhill disaster Medics rush to help Amy Willerton after horror crash in skeleton bobsled training on The Jump MARVEL-LOUS GOODBYE Hugh Jackman pulls out all the stops to make Logan the bloodiest X Men film yet Freeze-y does it Victoria and David Beckham enjoy family skiing trip as brood put 'Beckileaks' scandal behind them Against All Odds Mariah Carey swapped her engagement ring for a toyboy - here's the lowdown on Bryan Tanaka JUST LIKE ROYALTY Lisa Snowdon bears an uncanny resemblance to Kate Middleton as she arrives at London Fashion Week 
Indeed, she even exposed herself at one stage of the afternoon – flashing a nipple as she tried to adjust her swimsuit. 
Charlotte – who has an upcoming role in the Baywatch movie – was seen enjoying the company of female friends where she enjoyed the sun, sand and sea. Splash News Charlotte barely covered herself in her adventurous swimsuit Splash News Charlotte worked hard to keep her costume in place Splash News 23 The star has talked about her charity work inspired after she was bullied about her breasts 
She was also spied clutching some papers – suggesting she could be reading fresh scripts as her acting career starts to flourish. 
Charlotte has long had a hunger for acting roles and has been working hard to triumph over her dyslexia to land parts in films. 
“I’ve been doing more auditions. And I’m coaching, because I’m dyslexic. So with me, it’s really hard for me to remember stuff,” she explained to American GQ in 2015. 
“When I read—I read stuff, I can read!— it doesn’t register always. But it’s a challenge, and I love it,” she playfully added. Splash News Charlotte was spotted reading on the beach Splash News Charlotte has discussed her acting ambitions Splash News The Florida native says guys like to hang out with her as she is down to earth Splash News Charlotte enjoyed the sun in Miami Splash News 23 She wore glasses that matched her swimsuit colour 
For many, Charlotte became a star of interest following a Carl’s Jr. Burger Super Bowl commercial in 2015 – leading to Ryan Seacrest offering her a Kardashians style TV show which she swiftly turned down. 
“No way! Because I want my career to last a long time. I’d rather work and build and perfect something than rush into some dumb thing and look stupid,” the career savvy beauty is quoted as saying by GQ. 
Charlotte has also spoken freely about her dislike for bras and for being caked in make-up – revealing she would remove it all the second a professional shoot is over. Splash News Charlotte made sure she enjoyed the three “S’s” Splash News Sun, Sand, and Sea were the order of the day Splash News She took a dip in the afternoon Splash News Charlotte will feature in the Baywatch movie remake Splash News 23 Charlotte was joined by friends on the beach 
“I’m such a don’t-wear-a-bra kinda girl. Take the makeup off—I’m like ripping lashes off and pulling down my hair. Because I’m not that kinda girl. And that’s why I think guys connect with me,” she said – adding she thinks men like her because she keeps things ‘real’ unlike other well known models. 
While Charlotte has been blessed with 32F breasts, she says she didn’t always love her curvy body. Splash News Charlotte has made a career out of modelling Splash News The star shot to fame in a fast food advert Splash News Charlotte enjoyed her beach day in a daring swimsuit Splash News She has fronted campaigns for Guess in the past Splash News 23 Charlotte was also a star in series 20 of America’s Dancing With The Stars 
“Obviously, I got more attention from the male side than from the female side. I didn’t have any girlfriends. A lot of my friends were guys, and I was called a slut by a lot of people,” she told Ocean Drive magazine in 2015. 
“I was just growing these large breasts at such a young age, not really knowing what to do with them or how to wear them. So it was definitely awkward,” she revealed. Splash News
